name: Don't Rock The Boat
description:
You are a server on a cruise ship. The sea is rough and the cruise-goers are thirsty! Despite dangerous working conditions, you must keep these vacationers refreshed!

Use WASD to move.

Press space to refill vacationer's cups and your pitcher.

Brandon Blakemore: Level Design

David McCullough: Art and Engineering

Music courtesy of Echorobot

Made in 48 hours for Chillennium 2016.
